snippet.title: Petal Runner - Official Reveal Trailer | Day of the Devs 2024
snippet.description:
Watch the vibrant Petal Runner trailer for the new coming-of-age story set in a cyberpunk-inspired, pixel-art open world. Join Kira and Cali as they explore the city of Sapphire Valley and train to become specialized motorcycle couriers known as Petal Runners. Meet new friends, deliver packages, play minigames, and more in this wholesome slice-of-life story all about growing up.

Petal Runner is available to wishlist on Steam (PC).

#IGN #Gaming
